attributes.additional_details: The mayor of London promised cheaper transport in the election yet we now face an increase of 6.2% The government wants more people to work in London yet make it expensive for people therefore to balance it out we need cheaper fares to make job opportunities in London more feasible. Also students who commute of prices continue will not be able to afford these inflated prices. Less staff less service no seats treated like cattle let's make these prices fair. We have one of the worst train service in Europe yet the most expensive lets improve this together for jobs for students for commuters everywhere

rejection.details: What are you calling on the UK Government to do?
